These APIs allowPartners to read and write data, interoperate with other systems and platforms.Base URLhttps://myapi.logiwa.comCurrent Version3.1 & 3.2For 3.1 Swagger ClickFor 3.2 Swagger ClickNew On 3.2Get Warehouse LocationCreate Warehouse LocationCreate Warehouse Locations BulkUpdate Warehouse LocationGet ProductCreate ProductCreate Products BulkGet Shipment PlanList Shipment PlansList Shipment Plan OrdersList Shipment Plan LicenseplatesCreate Shipment PlanUpdate Shipment PlanDelete Shipment PlanCreate ReturnList CustomersCreate CustomerUpdate CustomerDelete CustomerCreate ClientUpdate ClientGeneral Rate Limits60 Requests per Minute, 2 request per second. you will retrieve rate info and next renewal date from header. Depends on endpoint, rate limits can be lower. If there is an extra limitation, you can find more detail on related endpoint description.Rate limits are available on webhook requests.WebhookNOTICEWhen using webhook, we recommend that you call the necessary endpoint from the API at regular intervals and check the missing information flow.Webhook (Logiwa Query Language)Logiwa uses its own query language on query endpoints as https//{subdomain}.logiwa.com/v{version}/{operationgroup}/i/0/s/15?{LQL}LQL aggregaters are;gt:greated_thangte:greater_than_or_equallt:less_thanlte:less_than_or_equaleq:equalbt:betweenAll query parameters are listed on related endpoints. If there is no query parameters on any endpoint it means that related method has no filter option.HTTP Status CodesStatus codeDescriptionWhat It Means200OKThe request was successful.201CreatedThe POST request was successful and the entity has been returned in theresponse.204No ContentThe GET request was successful and there is no content in the response.400Bad RequestThe request was malformed and could not be processed.If making an authorization request, this response may mean the Token are not accurate.401UnauthorizedThe token provided is either invalid or expired, the token was not provided inthe correct manner, or the token does not provide sufficient privileges for the action requested (i.e.attempting to make an update when the token provides read-only access).404Not FoundEither the URL format is invalid or an entity with the specified ID does notexist.413Request Entity Too LargeThe length of the request content has exceeded the maximum allowed limit.414Request URI Too LongThe length of the request URI has exceeded the maximum allowed limit.415Unsupported Media TypeThe request media type/format is not supported (ie: Content-Type value doesn'talign with what is expected).429Too Many RequestsA rate limit has been exceeded, resulting in the request being throttled.500Internal server errorAn system error occurred while processing the request. If this situationpersists, please open a support case.503Service UnavailableThe API is currently unavailable due to maintenance.AuthorizeAuthorize aims to get token for api operations. Token can be retrieved by using Username and Password. Token Scheme is Bearer .

namestring or null Name parameter indicates the Name of the product.
descriptionstring or null Description is a brief description of the product.
clientIdentifierstring or null <uuid>  ClientIdentifier parameter is used for your Client's Identifier.Check Lookup
clientstring or null carrierPackageIdentifierstring or null <uuid>  productGroupNamestring or null ProductGroupName is a brief description of the product group.
productTypeNamestring or null ProductTypeName is a brief description of the product type.
warehouseIdentifierstring or null <uuid>  WarehouseIdentifier parameter is used for your Warehouse's Identifier.Check Lookup
uomPackTypeNamestring or null Use this parameter to set the unit of measure for the product by selecting one of the Pack Types defined in your account for products.
uomRatiointeger or null <int32>  Ratio of parent pack type to uom pack type
skustring or null SKU is the Stock Keeping Unit of the product. It is the unique identifier for the product.
fnskustring or null upcArray of strings or null UPC is used as the code that will be referred for this product all through MyLogiwa.
currencyIdinteger or null <int32>  CurrencyId parameter indicates the currency used for this order.Check Currency Types
purchasePricenumber or null <double>  PurchasePrice is used for the purchase price of the product.
salesPricenumber or null <double>  SalesPrice is used for the sales price that a client puts on a product.
quantityinteger or null <int32>  Initial quantity of the product that will be added to inventory to the default receiving location automatically.
taxRatenumber or null <double>  Tax rate that is going to be applied on this product.
hazmatIdentificationNumberstring or null HazmatIdentificationNumber indicates the product's hazmat identification number description.
isPackagingMaterialboolean minimumSafetyStockinteger <int32>  isActiveboolean Set this value as True for this product to be active.
isDigitalProductboolean Set this value as true if this a digital product such as e-gift, e-book, software license.

warehouseIdentifierrequiredstring <uuid>  WarehouseIdentifier parameter is used for Warehouse Identifier that this purchase order will be received by.Check Lookup

actualArrivalDatestring or null <date-time>  ActualArrivalDate is the actual arrival date and time of the purchase order.
referenceNumberstring or null Use ReferenceNumber parameter for a reference or additional purchase order code that is created by vendor.
currencyIdrequiredany CurrencyId parameter indicates the currency used for this order.Check Currency Types
notestring or null Note parameter is for entering extra information on the purchase order (if needed).

Shipment PlanCreate ReturnList CustomersCreate CustomerUpdate CustomerDelete CustomerCreate ClientUpdate ClientGeneral Rate Limits60 Requests per Minute, 2 request per second.you will retrieve rate info and next renewal date from header.Depends on endpoint, rate limits can be lower.If there is an extra limitation, you can find more detail on related endpoint description.Rate limits are available on webhook requests.WebhookNOTICEWhen using webhook, we recommend that you call the necessary endpoint from the API at regular intervals and check the missing information flow.Webhook (Logiwa Query Language)Logiwa uses its own query language on query endpoints as https//{subdomain}.logiwa.com/v{version}/{operationgroup}/i/0/s/15?{LQL}LQL aggregaters are;gt:greated_thangte:greater_than_or_equallt:less_thanlte:less_than_or_equaleq:equalbt:betweenAll query parameters are listed on related endpoints.If there is no query parameters on any endpoint it means that related method has no filter option.HTTP Status CodesStatus codeDescriptionWhat It Means200OKThe request was successful.201CreatedThe POST request was successful and the entity has been returned in theresponse.204No ContentThe GET request was successful and there is no content in the response.400Bad RequestThe request was malformed and could not be processed.If making an authorization request, this response may mean the Token are not accurate.401UnauthorizedThe token provided is either invalid or expired, the token was not provided inthe correct manner, or the token does not provide sufficient privileges for the action requested (i.e.attempting to make an update when the token provides read-only access).404Not FoundEither the URL format is invalid or an entity with the specified ID does notexist.413Request Entity Too LargeThe length of the request content has exceeded the maximum allowed limit.414Request URI Too LongThe length of the request URI has exceeded the maximum allowed limit.415Unsupported Media TypeThe request media type/format is not supported (ie: Content-Type value doesn'talign with what is expected).429Too Many RequestsA rate limit has been exceeded, resulting in the request being throttled.500Internal server errorAn system error occurred while processing the request.If this situationpersists, please open a support case.503Service UnavailableThe API is currently unavailable due to maintenance.AuthorizeAuthorize aims to get token for api operations.Token can be retrieved by using Username and Password.Token Scheme is Bearer .Token Returns OpenAPI token
